title: Savoury choux buns with creamy mushrooms
description: This recipe has a wonderfully retro feel about it, and it’s none the worse for that. The delicious savoury flavours, and the beautifully crisp choux pastry, will always go down a storm.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz unsalted butter, cut into roughly 1cm/½in cubes
25g/½oz parmesan (or a similar vegetarian hard cheese), finely grated
